name: Gradonna Mountain Resort **** s
description: Nestled in the imposing mountain landscape of East Tyrol, the chalet can beat hotel and exclusive chalets each hiking and skiing heart racing resort with the ****. lend a spa area in each chalet, a spacious spa, pool and sauna area in the hotel, a free Anfängerskigelände in Chalet Resort and direct access to the hiking trails and the Grossglockner ski resort Kals-Matrei 37 km of slopes with private ski pass service in the hotel the guests in the car-free resort a unique environment to relax and unwind. Security and adventure, modernity and tradition, tourism and national park are terms that do not contradict the new **** s Gradonna Mountain Resort in Kals but also provide a new way of holiday-making in line guests.
